co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch
Interface RecordWritable<RECORD>

Type Parameters:
RECORD - the type of objects that represents a single record
All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
KeyValueTable
@Beta
public interface RecordWritable<RECORD>
extends Closeable

Interface for a dataset that a batch job can output to, as series of records (as apposed to key/value pairs). See BatchWritable.

Method Summary
 Type getRecordType()
          The type of records that the dataset exposes as a schema.
 void write(RECORD record)
          Writes the record into a dataset.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable
close
 

Method Detail

getRecordType

Type getRecordType()
The type of records that the dataset exposes as a schema. The schema will be derived from the type using reflection.

Returns:
the schema type.

write

void write(RECORD record)
           throws IOException
Writes the record into a dataset.

Parameters:
record - record to write into the dataset.
Throws:
IOException - when the RECORD could not be written to the dataset.
